content:
CFS-COS Firestop composite sheet Thin stainless steel firestop composite sheet ideal for sealing large openings ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop boards- - - ### FEATURES:Features Tested with Hilti GX nailers for fast attachment to base material – no anchors needed Compatible with cable management devices for medium- and low-voltage applications Labor saver – pre-cut holes for electrical riser applications Tested for up to 4 hours of fire resistance according to ASTM E814/UL1479 Non-magnetic #304 stainless steel backing helps to improve weatherability and no inductive loss in cables Applications Firestopping large openings Compatible with Hilti Speed Sleeve and gangplate for floor gang applications For use with large wall and floor fire-rated assemblies For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Concrete, Concrete over metal deck, Concrete block, Drywall Application temperature range: -22 - 118 °F Storage and transportation temperature range: -22 - 118 °F Technical Data | Base materials | Concrete, Concrete over metal deck, Concrete block, Drywall | Application temperature range | -22 - 118 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | -22 - 118 °F | Temperature resistance range | -22 - 250 °F | Surface burning characteristics UL 723 (ASTM E84) | Flame spread: 5
Smoke development: 20 | California State fire marshal approval | CSFM Listing 4485-1200:0503 for CFS-COS Composite Sheet | Shelf life | Not relevant | 1 | Intumescent | Yes | Product Class | Ultimate | at 77°F/25°C and 50% relative humidity; from date of manufacture ### ITEMS- 2228524 - CFS-COS 28x52 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-COS 28x52 FS comp. sheet - 3610333 - CFS-COS Comp Sheet 28x52 Combo (4) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 4x CFS-COS 28x52 FS comp. sheet - 2228525 - CFS-COS 36x36 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-COS 36x36 FS comp. sheet - 3610261 - CFS-COS Comp Sheet 36x36 Combo (4) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 4x CFS-COS 36x36 FS comp. sheet - 2228523 - CFS-COS 36x41 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-COS 36x41 FS comp. sheet - 3610262 - CFS-COS Comp Sheet 36x41 Combo (4) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 4x CFS-COS 36x41 FS comp. sheet
